name: Timeless Heroes
description:
This is a match-3 game with some RPG touches with skills, heroes and items

Timeless Heroes combines the match-3 puzzles with RPG to overcome awesome adventures. 

- Match3 Puzzle Solving:

Use the board to damage your enemies. Be wise with the combos and the skills.

- Collect all heroes:

Catch every hero from the past and use them to defeat the dragons. Every hero has different skills !

- Prepare yourself for the combat:

Equip your heroes with the finest equipment to help you succeed.
